description: This file is a C header file defining internal functions, macros, and constants for the 'icrule' subsystem within the 'zilker-sdk'. It includes function prototypes for parsing XML nodes, retrieving configuration directories, and updating message actions, along with macro definitions for utility purposes.

methods.name: icrule_get_action_list_dir
methods.description: Returns the directory path for action list XML files, which is a constant string and should not be freed.

methods.name: icrule_parse_time_slot
methods.description: Parses an XML node representing a time slot into an icrule_time_t structure, returning 0 on success or -1 on failure.

methods.name: icrule_update_message_attachment
methods.description: Updates message actions to include 'video' or 'picture' attachments if needed, based on action list input.

methods.name: strtok2list
methods.description: Converts a delimited string into an icLinkedList of tokens.
